name: Maushold
description: The Family Pokémon. The two little ones just appeared one day. The group might be a family of related Pokémon, but nobody knows for sure.

abilities.name: Friend Guard
abilities.description: Once per long rest, when an ally within 15 feet of this Pokémon is hit by an attack, it may choose to halve the damage dealt.

abilities.name: Cheek Pouch
abilities.description: When this Pokémon eats any type of berry, is heals for an additional 10% of its maximum HP (rounded up to the nearest whole number).

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: For damaging moves activated by this Pokémon with 15 max PP or more, they may roll the damage twice and choose either total.
